name: virgin-media-chatbot-demo
description: Virgin Media Chatbot Demo - Single test case for demonstration purposes

scripts.clean:all: npm run report:clean && npm run screenshots:clean && npm run logs:clean
scripts.clean:before-test: npm run clean:all && if not exist logs mkdir logs && if not exist screenshots mkdir screenshots && if not exist allure-results mkdir allure-results && if not exist test-results mkdir test-results
scripts.report:clean: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report
scripts.screenshots:clean: if exist screenshots del /q screenshots\* 2>nul || echo No screenshots to clean
scripts.logs:clean: if exist logs del /q logs\* 2>nul || echo No logs to clean
